description.narrative: This activity (Monitoring & Evaluation) is a component of 'Pakistan National Cash Transfers Programme' reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £6,477,303. This component benefits Pakistan, and works in the following sector(s): Public sector policy and administrative management, Social Protection. , with the following implementing partners: Coffey International Development, Crown Agents Limited, Delivery Associates Ltd, Mott MacDonald Limited, Oxford Policy Management. The start date is 24-09-2012 and the end date is 30-03-2021.
